name: Escape the Enterprise/逃离企业号
description: a mystery/puzzle solving game that takes place in future. Player controls the heroine to investigate what has happened inside a spaceship and escape from it eventually. The game has plenty of puzzles; unique, fascinating plot; and multiple endings.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent AMD Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 280 series or higher Storage: 512 MB available space
